data.title: Dynamic Engineering
data.meta_description: Career Planning Dynamic’s relationship with those individuals that make up its workforce is paramount to the success of both parties.
data.text:
The Dynamic Family of Companies (Dynamic Engineering Consultants, PC; Dynamic Earth, LLC; Dynamic Survey, LLC; Dynamic Traffic, LLC) serve to provide unparalleled Land Development Consulting services with a national footprint. We are seeking exceptional professionals to join our team. Engineers, Land Surveyors, Landscape Architects, Scientists and allied professionals choose to join Dynamic Engineering because of our meaningful career opportunities and entrepreneurial business approach. Dynamic seeks to creatively transform how our world is envisioned, designed, and experienced, and it starts with our team. Join Dynamic and ignite both your passion for people and commitment to greatness.

Your professional interests are our attractions. A career with Dynamic will help you achieve your professional development goals. We offer a supportive and flexible work environment that empowers employees to stay healthy, fulfill their passions, with balance to work and life goals.

Benefits: Health Insurance Benefits, Disability and 401k Retirement Accounts, FSA’s, Paid Vacation and Sick Time, Paid Holidays, Parental Leave, and Pathways for career advancement.

Dynamic is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identify, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.

What we offer:

The Dynamic family of companies has a strong history of developing talented Engineers, Scientists, and other professionals from the ground up. We have developed training protocols that expose our team members to all aspects of the services we offer. As a member of the Dynamic team, you will work shoulder to shoulder with our Leaders on a variety of multi-disciplinary projects starting your very first week, giving you the hands-on knowledge needed for a successful career in the Land Development industry.

As an intern or new hire, you are entered into a mentorship program, where team members are paired with a leader who will guide the individual through the onboarding process and help integrate the new employee into the Dynamic Culture. Your mentor will encourage you to learn about the land development/engineering industry, as well as provide guidance on career progression and growth.

Dynamic University, a highly engaging and informational Professional Development day, aimed to provide all employees with the tools to increase efficiency and maximize best practices, while gaining additional knowledge of the broad spectrum of services Dynamic Engineering provides. It will be a key tool in enabling Dynamic Engineering to continue to offer the best service to our clients.

Bachelors in Civil Engineering from ABET accredited University.

Strong academic record with relevant class work.

Prior internship experience in the engineering consulting industry is preferred.

Exposure to industry software – AutoCAD, Civil3D, Bluebeam, Adobe, Windows Office suite

Ambitious, coachable, and driven to succeed in your career.

What we offer:

The Dynamic family of companies strives to offer strong career advancement opportunities to those with experience in our specialties – Land Development Engineering, Environmental Consulting, Geotechnical Engineering, Traffic design and planning, and Inspections. We provide opportunities to grow your career on both a “Client Management” as well as a “Subject Matter Expert” track. As we continue to grow in both geography and our service offerings, opportunities to expand your skills and truly take ownership of certain aspects of the business are presented regularly.

Our ownership structure is one of the things that truly makes Dynamic unique. We strongly believe that our success is a direct result of our team and their efforts. While many in our industry claim it, our track record of creating Partners within the firm speaks for itself. Take a look at our Leadership page for first hand examples!

The leadership team at Dynamic believes that training and mentoring never stops, regardless of your time in the industry. Experienced professionals who join Dynamic are continually exposed to opportunities, through contact with high level managers and partners, to advance themselves with respect to employee management, client development, project management best practices, technical expertise, and more.

Dynamic University is a highly engaging and informational Professional Development day, aimed to provide all employees with the tools to increase efficiency and maximize best practices, while gaining additional knowledge of the broad spectrum of services Dynamic Engineering provides. Dynamic U. is a key tool in enabling Dynamic Engineering to continue to offer the best service to our clients.

We look for professionals with experience in our areas of expertise – land development, environmental consulting, geotechnical engineering, traffic design and planning, and inspection services.

Relevant education – Bachelors in Engineering (or related field) is required and advanced degrees and preferred.

Skills/traits of those who succeed at Dynamic

Strong design and/or technical experience

Ability to train, develop, and manage a team of technical staff

Client management and development skills

Entrepreneurial spirit

Professional licensure (or on a path to obtaining it)

Contact Dynamic’s Talent Acquisition Manager, CJ Schmitt to inquire further on opportunities.
